title: Bronze Flex team?
body:
Looking for reliable players that play regularly to join me in my quest to climb out of Bronze, Top lane main:{{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:68}} 

i can also play jungle and ADC hmu in game

replies.body:
Add me, I main top but can play anywhere. Always happy for duos.

{{champion:78}} main, with a whole bunch of {{champion:126}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:2}}  thrown in

{{champion:28}}  and  {{champion:1}}  main. Jungle and/or mid. Can play other champions such as  {{champion:131}} , {{champion:39}} , {{champion:55}} , {{champion:121}} ,  and {{champion:61}} .

OP.GG: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Percival9
90% win-rate in past 15 or 16 games.

If you want me, add Percival9.
